#summary A Mavenized Version of Seam In Action Chapter Two.

= A Mavenized Version of Seam In Action Chapter Two. =

We have made a Mavenized version of the source code for chapter two in the Seam In Action book using the *seam-refimpl* as a project template. The project requires JBoss-4.2.3 or JBoss-5.x and MySql-5x to run.
